description.value:
Whether through the ancestry of an efreet, a deal with a demon, or an elemental influence, those on the Path of the Pyreheart draw from a very real inner fire. These barbarians summon flames that sear their enemies and smolder within superheated veins.

Pyrehearts can draw from a number of different sources ranging from the demonic to the artificial. A Warforged might possess an inner furnace or be imbued with a bound elemental, casting forth flames like the famous Lord of Blades. The chieftain of a Carrion Tribe might hurl demonic flames at her foes, born from the influence of the Demon Wastes, or a pact with the Overlord Kharna Rayva. A Tiefling touched by Fernia or Lamannia might find their anger manifesting as elemental fire - a dangerous ability for those unaware of their birthright.
